title: "The SNP’s Gender Recognition Bill is threat to women"
excerpt: "The Scottish government published its Gender Recognition Reform (Scotland) Bill last week. This bill will make it easier for adults in Scotland to change their legal gender, even lowering the age – from 18 to 16 – at which they will be able to do so."
